statements: SELECT * FROM satellite_altitude_changes ORDER BY satellite_id DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, altitude FROM satellite_altitude_changes WHERE altitude > 1000;
SELECT timestamp, altitude FROM satellite_altitude_changes WHERE satellite_id = 3;
SELECT satellite_id, timestamp, altitude FROM satellite_altitude_changes ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_altitude_changes WHERE timestamp < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY altitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_altitude_changes WHERE altitude > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT satellite_id, altitude FROM satellite_altitude_changes WHERE altitude BETWEEN 500 AND 800 ORDER BY altitude ASC
SELECT DISTINCT satellite_id FROM satellite_altitude_changes ORDER BY satellite_id ASC
SELECT * FROM satellite_altitude_changes WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY altitude DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_changes FROM satellite_altitude_changes
SELECT * FROM satellite_data;
SELECT satellite_id, altitude FROM satellite_data WHERE altitude > 5000;
SELECT report_id, date FROM report ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, change_amount FROM report WHERE change_amount < 0;
SELECT * FROM satellite_data JOIN report ON satellite_data.satellite_id = report.satellite_id;
SELECT * FROM satellite_data WHERE altitude > 1000 ORDER BY satellite_id DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, altitude FROM satellite_data WHERE altitude < 500 ORDER BY altitude ASC;
SELECT count(*) AS total_satellites FROM satellite_data;
SELECT * FROM satellite_data INNER JOIN report ON satellite_data.satellite_id = report.satellite_id WHERE report.date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report.change_amount DESC, report.date ASC;
SELECT satellite_id, MAX(altitude) AS max_altitude FROM satellite_data GROUP BY satellite_id HAVING MAX(altitude) > 500;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteData;
SELECT satellite_id, altitude FROM SatelliteData WHERE altitude > 1000;
SELECT satellite_id, timestamp FROM SatelliteData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM ReportOverview WHERE creation_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT change_id, satellite_id, change_amount FROM AltitudeChange WHERE change_amount < 0 ORDER BY change_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT satellite_id, altitude FROM SatelliteData WHERE altitude > 10000;
SELECT satellite_id, MAX(altitude) FROM SatelliteData GROUP BY satellite_id;
SELECT * FROM ReportOverview ORDER BY creation_date;
SELECT report_name, creation_date FROM ReportOverview WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT satellite_name, altitude FROM satellite;
SELECT change_date, change_amount FROM altitude_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT report_date, satellite_id FROM reports WHERE satellite_id = 3;
SELECT satellite_id, average_altitude, max_altitude, min_altitude FROM aggregated_reports;
SELECT * FROM satellite WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM satellite WHERE altitude > 10000;
SELECT satellite_name, altitude FROM satellite ORDER BY altitude DESC;

SELECT satellite_name, change_date, change_amount FROM satellite JOIN altitude_changes ON satellite.satellite_id = altitude_changes.satellite_id WHERE altitude_changes.change_amount > 100 ORDER BY change_date ASC;
SELECT satellite_name, report_date FROM satellite JOIN reports ON satellite.satellite_id = reports.satellite_id WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT satellite_id, average_altitude, max_altitude, min_altitude FROM aggregated_reports WHERE average_altitude > 15000;
SELECT * FROM Satellites;
SELECT id, name, altitude FROM Satellites ORDER BY altitude DESC;
SELECT name, altitude FROM Satellites WHERE altitude > 500;
SELECT * FROM ReportGeneration WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT report_name, generated_by, generated_timestamp FROM ReportGeneration WHERE generated_by LIKE 'John%';
SELECT name, altitude FROM Satellites WHERE altitude > 1000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, report_name, report_date FROM ReportGeneration WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, timestamp, change FROM AltitudeChanges WHERE change < 0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT r.report_name, s.name, r.min_altitude, r.max_altitude FROM Reports r JOIN Satellites s ON r.satellite_id = s.id WHERE r.min_altitude < 5000 AND r.max_altitude > 10000 ORDER BY r.report_name ASC;
SELECT r.report_name, ag.average_altitude, ag.total_changes FROM ReportGeneration r JOIN AggregateData ag ON r.id = ag.report_id WHERE ag.total_changes > 50 ORDER BY ag.average_altitude DESC;
